meanings.definition: The time of day between sunset and darkness.
meanings.sent1: During the gloamings, the sky turns a beautiful shade of orange.
meanings.sent2: We took a peaceful walk in the gloamings before heading home.
meanings.sent3: The gloamings made it hard to see, so we played a game of hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: As the gloamings settled in, the world seemed to quiet down.
meanings.sent5: The gloamings painted the sky with soft pastel colors, like a gentle artist's brush.

meanings.definition: The dim light or dusk of evening.
meanings.sent1: In the gloamings, the streetlights flickered on one by one.
meanings.sent2: The gloamings cast a mysterious shadow over the old abandoned house.
meanings.sent3: The gloamings made it hard to read, so we used a flashlight to finish our book.
meanings.sent4: Under the gloamings, the world seemed to take on a magical glow.
meanings.sent5: The gloamings enveloped the town in a soft, comforting blanket of light.
